description: Former Sen. Thad Cochran (R-Miss.), who served in Congress for more than 45 years, died Thursday morning at the age of 81.

description: Mine workers warned managers that the structure, which held mining waste, was about to collapse, a Wall Street Journal investigation has found. At least one of them died when it did. Vale denies that it ignored warning signs.
title: He Was Ignored: Workers at Brazils Vale Predicted Dams Tragic Collapse

description:
Former head of the British Army, General Sir Mike Jackson, has told the Ballymurphy inquest into the deaths of 10 people in west Belfast that the Army does not do conspiracies.

author: BBC News
description: Saybie is believed to be the world's smallest infant to survive after weighing just 8.6 ounces or 245 grams at birth.

description: President Trump on Thursday defended the reported decision by military officials to obscure the USS McCain during his trip to Japan, saying whoever made the order was "well meaning."
